data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the county of Udalguri. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Udalguri, Assam, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Udalguri, Assam, India to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 812,460 who are far from you in Udalguri, Assam, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Udalguri, Assam, India.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Assamese (Muslim traditions) people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Assamese (Muslim traditions) people.
Father, convict the 9,149 believers in Udalguri to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Udalguri, Assam, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 822,551 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 9,149 believers in Udalguri to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

location.name: Udalguri
